attributes.action: Create a union between the UK and Ireland to fase out the EU
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If you look at the UK's culture to the EU's we are actually nothing alike, but if you look at Irelands and the UK's we are identical in every way, from language, people (the uk has a hugh irish comunity and irish ancestry), tv programming, celtic history, were both one country in the past, we even drive on the same side of the road unlike the rest of the EU est est, it goes on. A union like this would have no language problems  or culture destruction. It could start from minor things then building up to what the EU does, the UK and Irelands economies would take the world by storm put together.
